sn1.14:4.1: “An aristocrat is the best of bipeds,
sn1.14:4.2: an ox is the best of quadrupeds,
sn1.14:4.3: a maiden is the best of wives,
sn1.14:4.4: and a first-born the best of sons.”
sn1.14:5.1: “A Buddha is the best of bipeds,
sn1.14:5.2: a thoroughbred is the best of quadrupeds,
sn1.14:5.3: a good listener is the best of wives,
sn1.14:5.4: and the best of sons is loyal.”
